mapper.insert: insert into t_byuyuan (byuyuanId, byuyuanName, byuyuanMark, byuyuanMark1, byuyuanMark2, byuyuanType, byuyuanType1, byuyuanType2, byuyuanDouble, byuyuanDouble1, byuyuanDouble2) values (#{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuyuanMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuyuanMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuyuanMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byuyuanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuyuanType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuyuanType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{byuyuanDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byuyuanDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{byuyuanDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_byuyuan set byuyuanName = #{byuyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuyuanMark = #{byuyuanMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuyuanMark1 = #{byuyuanMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuyuanMark2 = #{byuyuanMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, byuyuanType = #{byuyuanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuyuanType1 = #{byuyuanType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuyuanType2 = #{byuyuanType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, byuyuanDouble = #{byuyuanDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byuyuanDouble1 = #{byuyuanDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, byuyuanDouble2 = #{byuyuanDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where byuyuanId = #{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select byuyuanId, byuyuanName, byuyuanMark, byuyuanMark1, byuyuanMark2, byuyuanType, byuyuanType1, byuyuanType2, byuyuanDouble, byuyuanDouble1, byuyuanDouble2 from t_byuyuan where byuyuanId = #{byuyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
